Uses of Interface
net.finmath.time.daycount.DayCountConventionInterface

  • Packages that use DayCountConventionInterface 
    Package Description
    net.finmath.time
    Provides interfaces and classes for time discretizations, tenors and (swap) schedule generation.
    net.finmath.time.daycount  

    • Uses of DayCountConventionInterface in net.finmath.time

      Methods in net.finmath.time that return DayCountConventionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DayCountConventionInterface ScheduleInterface.getDaycountconvention()
      Returns the daycount convention used to calculate period lengths.
      DayCountConventionInterface Schedule.getDaycountconvention() 
      DayCountConventionInterface RegularSchedule.getDaycountconvention() 
      Constructors in net.finmath.time with parameters of type DayCountConventionInterface 
      Constructor and Description

    • Uses of DayCountConventionInterface in net.finmath.time.daycount

      Classes in net.finmath.time.daycount that implement DayCountConventionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DayCountConvention_30E_360
      Implementation of 30E/360.
      class  DayCountConvention_30E_360_ISDA
      Implementation of 30/360 ISDA.
      class  DayCountConvention_30U_360
      Calculates the day count using the US 30/360 adjusted method.
      class  DayCountConvention_ACT
      Base class which calculates the day count by calculating the actual number of days between startDate and endDate.
      class  DayCountConvention_ACT_360
      Implementation of ACT/360.
      class  DayCountConvention_ACT_365
      Implementation of ACT/365.
      class  DayCountConvention_ACT_ACT_AFB
      Implementation of ACT/ACT AFB.
      class  DayCountConvention_ACT_ACT_ISDA
      Implementation of ACT/ACT ISDA.
      class  DayCountConvention_ACT_ACT_YEARFRAC
      Implementation of ACT/ACT as in Excel (2013).
      Methods in net.finmath.time.daycount that return DayCountConventionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DayCountConventionInterface DayCountConventionFactory.getDayCountConvention(String convention)
      Create a day count convention base on a convention string.
